# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## [0.1.0] - 2025-05-30

Initial release

### Added

- `rowtable` function
- `row-split` function
- `expandcell` function
- Support for `table.footer` and `table.header` in rowtable.
  They are handled just like other rows, splitting on separator.
